body: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton, in Texas on Thursday, called for new policies to make it easier for people to vote. She trying to attract young people, single women, Hispanics and African-American voters — the so-called Obama Coalition.
description: Democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton, in Texas on Thursday, called for new policies to make it easier for people to vote. She trying to attract young people, single women, Hispanics and African-American voters — the so-called Obama Coalition.
title: As Campaign Ramps Up, Clinton Courts Obama Coalition Voters
